amendatorysection.para: (1) Driver training school or school means a business enterprise conducted by an individual, association, partnership, limited liability company, or corporation or a public or private educational facility which educates or trains persons to operate or drive motor vehicles or which furnishes educational materials to prepare an applicant for an examination by the state for an operator's license, provisional operator's permit, or LPD-learner's or LPE-learner's permit and which charges consideration or tuition for such service or materials; and

(2) Instructor means any person who operates a driver training school or who teaches, conducts classes, gives demonstrations, or supervises practical training of persons learning to operate or drive motor vehicles in connection with operation of a driver training school.
